"Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book."
*Make sure to read all instructions before attempting the quiz

NIMBUS is the annual technical festival of National Institute of Technology, Hamirpur, Himachal Pradesh, India. It is an amalgamation of ideas, expressions, innovations, prototypes, knowledge channels, taken to the most premier levels. Nimbus has become the biggest technical fest of Northern India.

Please read below instruction very carefully:-

 1. This quiz is hosted by AppTeam of NIT Hamirpur.

 2. Important: Make sure that your device remains connected to Internet while attempting quiz.

 3. Make sure that all personal information about you in current account is correct, otherwise you may be disqualified.

 4. When you enter the quiz, you will be provided with a set of 10 randomly chosen questions.

 5. Each question is unique and will not appear again. 

 6. Their is no negative marking for wrong answer, so it is better to attempt all questions. And for correct answer you will be provided one point.

 7. Important: Time limit to attempt a set of question is 2 minutes. 
You have to finish the quiz in 2 minutes to make your score count.

 8. After attempting all questions press finish button to submit your inputs. After 2 minutes, inputs will automatically gets submitted.

 9. Do not close app after starting quiz, because you will be given only one attempt to each set of questions.

 10. After clicking on submit you will be shown only score corresponding to that set of questions.

 11. Advice: Attempt as many sets possible to score more points.

 12. Winners will be announced after Nimbus 2017, and will be rewarded.

 13. For any queries/complaints/bugs, contact us at appteam.nith@gmail.com

* Keep yourself updated with all the happenings of NIMBUS 2k17.

 * Add your Nimbus projects along with a description and image of same.

 * Add important news and announcement of various events organised during Nimbus.

 * Exciting cash prizes for the posts with maximum likes.
